name: Ceruti Consulting

goal:
At Ceruti Consulting, we work to anticipate, understand and shape the Brussels playing field to protect and advance your interests across Europe. Acting as a trusted partner, we can help you successfully navigate and seize the opportunities of the highly-regulated and often complex European policy landscape.
Combining board-level expertise in industry with extensive consultant experience on the client side, we speak your language and understand your needs. Including the need for proactive joined-up thinking that bridges the gap between the business and regulatory worlds.
Following a pragmatic results-driven approach, we provide complete integrated support. From EU policies and legislation representation, counseling and outreach to international affairs, communications and strategic alliances.
interests: Agriculture, Communication, Culture and media, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trade, Youth
